techmeme.title: Apple unveils iPhone 16 Pro and Pro Max with larger 6.3" and 6.9" displays, four titanium finishes, Camera Control, A18 Pro, new 48mp ultrawide camera, and more (Hartley Charlton/MacRumors)
Apple Intelligence will launch in beta in October for US English language users, coming to more countries in December; support for other languages coming 2025 (Benjamin Mayo/9to5Mac)
Apple announces hearing health related features for AirPods Pro 2, including a "clinical grade" hearing aid mode and a clinically-validated hearing test (Benjamin Mayo/9to5Mac)
Apple debuts the iPhone 16 and 16 Plus with an Action button, a 3nm A18 chip for 30% faster CPU performance vs iPhone 15, a side Camera Control button, and more (Benjamin Mayo/9to5Mac)
Apple unveils two new AirPods 4 models with an H2 chip and USB-C; AirPods 4 for $129 and AirPods 4 with Active Noise Cancellation for $179, coming September 20 (Brian Heater/TechCrunch)
